Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.controllers

Class InitializeCardsController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.controllers.ControllerGUI
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.controllers.InitializeCardsController
public class InitializeCardsController extends ControllerGUI
Controller class for initializing and managing UI components related to selecting cards in the GUI.

  • Method Details

    • setCards

      public void setCards(String imagePath1, String imagePath2)
      Sets the images for the two card ImageViews.
      Parameters:
      imagePath1 - path to the first card image
      imagePath2 - path to the second card image

    • setTitleField

      public void setTitleField(String text)
      Updates the title field with the specified text.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to set as the title

    • chooseCardClick

      public void chooseCardClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the click event on the card ImageViews. Adds the selected index as a string to the input GUI.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the MouseEvent triggered by clicking on an ImageView

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller after the FXML file has been loaded. Sets up event listeners for mouse clicks on the card ImageViews.

    • highlightImage

      public void highlightImage(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Highlights the ImageView when the mouse enters.
      Parameters:
      event - the MouseEvent triggered by entering the ImageView area

    • unhighlightImage

      public void unhighlightImage(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Removes the highlight effect from the ImageView when the mouse exits.
      Parameters:
      event - the MouseEvent triggered by exiting the ImageView area
